title: qty of material needed for bench seats/curtains/lino

posts.content:
hi guys
please can you help me.
i would like to know the quantity of material i need for the bench seat cushions for my curved devon interior and also the quantity needed to have curtains all round in a 23 window bus.
also please the qty of lino needed to cover the cargo floor area and the are above the engine bay.
many thanks
5 meteres of material for the cushions if unpiped
